Hello ecomobile,

The return that the customer made was delivered to you on 05/30/2024.

According to the quality charter, you have 48 working hours from receipt of the return to make the refund.

Please do what is necessary within the next 24 hours. Otherwise, we will be forced to reimburse the customer's order at your expense.

Sincerely,

Anicette from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.
